channel.title: Clustering Methods on Qiongjie's Notes

item.title: SwAV: Swapping Assignments between Views
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: Simultaneously cluster the data and learn visual representations by enforcing consistency between cluster assignments, or ‘codes’, generated from different augmented views of the same image.
